alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 9:32PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Fayette County through 1030 PM CDT... At 932 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fairbank, or 11 miles west of Oelwein, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Oelwein around 950 PM CDT. Arlington around 1005 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
